backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing public and personal songs, user profiles, access control, and admin/user upload flows with blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping song upload and branding requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files, their purposes, and feature-related behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions with OKLCH theme variables and light/dark mode tokens applied globally.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry including Fourleaf branding, favicon, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theming, admin guard, and global toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, rendering clear fallback UI for each state.
frontend/src/components/admin/SongEditor: Dialog for creating or editing songs with file uploads, progress tracking, validation, and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with UI sounds and query cache reset.
frontend/src/components/branding/Fourlea: Renders the Fourleaf brand logo in full, compact, or icon variants using SVG and optional text.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogS: Displays a song row with cover art, metadata, play controls, duration, and a download button.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Download: Provides a download button with auth and subscription checks, handling audio file retrieval and download.
frontend/src/components/catalog/PublicSo: Implements a dialog for authenticated users to upload public songs with metadata, audio, and cover image support.
frontend/src/components/home/HorizontalS: Creates a horizontally scrollable, snap-aligned row container for child elements.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingCa: Displays a clickable song card with cover art, play button, and transition context handling.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingSe: Wraps a streaming section with a title, optional icon, and a 'Show all' button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with mobile header, sidebars, routed content, audio player, and profile setup handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderSea: A header search bar with home navigation, a browse menu, query state handling, and accessibility controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/HomeTabBa: Renders tab buttons for switching between All, Music, and Podcast browsing categories.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: A left navigation sidebar with brand, navigation links, optional admin link, and UI sound controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/RightDeta: Displays details of the currently playing song or a placeholder when nothing is playing.
frontend/src/components/personal/Persona: A dialog for authenticated users to upload personal songs with metadata, file inputs, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/player/AudioPlay: The main audio player bar handling playback logic, streaming, seeking, volume, and queue navigation.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Prompts new authenticated users to create a profile with a name and subscription flag.
frontend/src/components/settings/UISound: Controls for enabling UI sound effects and adjusting their volume.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioQueue.ts: Manages a Zustand-powered audio queue with playback state, navigation, and now-playing UI controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeaderSearch.ts: Simple Zustand store for a header search query with setters and clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBrowsing.ts: Zustand store controlling the active home tab and scroll-reset behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, state management, and an auth context using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating songs, profiles, and uploads using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISounds.ts: Utility hook to play UI click sounds respecting user sound settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISoundSettings.ts: Persistent Zustand store for toggling UI sounds and adjusting volume.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base with custom light/dark theme variables, utilities, and UI styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for listing, creating, editing, and deleting catalog songs with cover previews and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Public library page showing all songs with search, recommendations, browsing tabs, and playback queue integration.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: User’s personal library page with authentication check, personal song filtering, playback, uploads, and removal actions.
frontend/src/pages/NowPlayingPage.tsx: Fullscreen now‑playing view showing artwork, song info, progress controls, and playback/volume management.
frontend/src/pages/PlayerLayoutPage.tsx: Standalone player layout with sidebar navigation, hero section, playback controls, and sample track list.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders a pricing page displaying weekly, monthly, and yearly subscription plans with feature lists and a highlighted popular option.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session-stored parameters, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings, with plugins enabled for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, existing features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes for the website.
